headline: Typhoon Goni Leaves Philippines After Only Grazing Manila
snippet: With sustained winds of up to 135 miles an hour at landfall, the storm barreled across Luzon, the country’s most populous island, but mostly missed the capital. At least 16 people were killed.
keywords: ['Typhoons', 'Landslides and Mudslides', 'Hurricanes and Tropical Storms', 'Typhoon Haiyan (2013)']

headline: Trump Camp Uses Online Gimmick to Fuel Donations Into December
snippet: The Trump campaign is now automatically checking a box to create recurring weekly donations from supporters until mid-December.
keywords: ['Presidential Election of 2020', 'Campaign Finance', 'Political Advertising']

headline: George Shultz Speaks Out for Renewing U.S. Leadership Overseas
snippet: At a moment when the United States has pulled back from its allies, the former secretary of state lamented the Trump administration’s allergy to international accords.
keywords: ['United States International Relations', 'ARMS CONTROL AND LIMITATION AND DISARMAMENT', 'Treaties']

headline: Police in North Carolina use a chemical spray to disperse a get-out-the-vote rally.
snippet: Police officers and sheriff’s deputies in Graham, N.C., deployed a chemical spray and arrested eight people at a get-out-the-vote march and rally on Saturday, according to the police and participants.

headline: Stanford Study Seeks to Quantify Infections Stemming From Trump Rallies
snippet: The researchers used a statistical model to extrapolate infections tied to 18 rallies, and the study’s figures were not based on individual cases traced directly to particular campaign events.
keywords: ['Contact Tracing (Public Health)', 'Presidential Election of 2020']
